biotools.summary: RDC-based SSE PAcking with NOEs for Structure Determination and NOE Assignment is a suite of programs for nuclear Overhauser effect (NOE) assignment and high-resolution structure determination starting with a global fold calculated from exact solutions to the residual dipolar coupling (RDC) equations. It is specifically designed for automated NMR NOE assignment and protein structure determination.

bioschemas.name: RDC-PANDA
